net.kuujo.vertigo.cluster.data

Interface AsyncQueue<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The queue data type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncCollection<T>

    public interface AsyncQueue<T>
extends AsyncCollection<T>
    Asynchronous queue.

    If the current Vert.x instance is a Hazelcast clustered instance, the queue will be backed by a Hazelcast queue. Otherwise, the queue will be backed by a Vert.x shared data map.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      • offer

        void offer(T value)
        Inserts the element into the queue if it's immediately possible to do so.
        Parameters:

      • offer

        void offer(T value,
         org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<Boolean>> doneHandler)
        Inserts the element into the queue if it's immediately possible to do so.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to insert.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete.

      • element

        void element(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<T>> resultHandler)
        Retrieves but does not remove the head of the queue.
        Parameters:
        resultHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called with the result.

      • peek

        void peek(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<T>> resultHandler)
        Retrieves but does not remove the head of the queue. If there is no value at the head of the queue then the result value will be null.
        Parameters:
        resultHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called with the result.

      • poll

        void poll(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<T>> resultHandler)
        Retrieves and removed the head of the queue. If there is no value at the head of the queue then the result value will be null.
        Parameters:
        resultHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called with the result.

      • remove

        void remove(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<T>> resultHandler)
        Retrieves and removed the head of the queue.
        Parameters:
        resultHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called with the result.
